QuestData.Title: Takes One to Know One
QuestData.Description: While we should never miss an opportunity to strike out against the Alliance, we mustn't forget about the Scourge.$b$bWe won't have the numbers here to make a proper assault in the glacier for weeks, but that won't keep us from learning all we can know about their defenses.$b$bI have asked our resident death knight to advise you in this effort. After all, who better knows this enemy than they?$b$bAllow me to introduce Koltira Deathweaver.
QuestData.LogDescription: Sky-Reaver Korm wants you to speak to Koltira Deathweaver on Orgrim's Hammer.
QuestData.RewardText: <Koltira looks you up and down.>$b$bI hope for your sake that you're up to this, $c.
